text:
Shop name means "Village Curry Meal"?

Anyway... The chicken tikka $7 is a solid 5/5.. So inherently flavourful that the dipping sauces not needed at all.

Beware mutton tripe is on the spicier side than usual.... A few chili slices hiding inside... ðŸ˜‚
Can eat once. Tried the fish meals and Pulao. The food is too oily. Not authentic Indian food.
